item.title: Smartphones are breeding a generation of computer illiterate kids
item.description: Before I start talking smack, let me give a little background. I’m almost 19. I’ve been using computers probably since I was like 2 or 3 years old. Having a father who worked with tech and stuff naturally led me to use computers more than most kids back then. I got a pretty big head start. But I’m also still a kid in the eyes of many. However I feel like not many kids today have the same opportunity I did.
